function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Chagas disease and leishmaniasis transmission","Impact":"Continued transmission of these diseases can lead to high infection rates and health risks for affected populations","Mitigation":"Vigilant vector control and elimination initiatives","Technologies":"Insecticide application, screening and treatment initiatives","People":"Population in affected regions","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Ineffective vector control methods","Impact":"Ineffective vector control can lead to high infestation rates and increased transmission of diseases","Mitigation":"Research and development of effective vector control methods, including insecticide-treated bed nets and collars","Technologies":"Insecticide-treated bed nets, deltamethrin-impregnated dog collars","People":"Population in regions with vector-borne diseases","Owner":"Research institutions, health organizations"},{"Description":"Impact of vector behavior on disease control","Impact":"Vector behavior, such as exophagic behavior, can impact the effectiveness of disease control methods","Mitigation":"Research and understanding of vector behavior to develop targeted control strategies","Technologies":"Research on vector behavior, development of targeted control strategies","People":"Population in regions with vector-borne diseases","Owner":"Research institutions, health organizations"}]}
